Nemesis Enforcer/Dark One/Pyro 
DoublePunch/Injector/Manterror/Hades/Anubis/Shuko:


::Nemesis Enforcer stepped out of the CR chamber he had been placed in::
<On my way, Zardus> ::He said, as he headed for the bridge of the Alliance 
craft::

::Once there, Nemesis looked to Zardus::
"Your command?"

==========

::Dark One stepped up to the Alliance base, setting Pyro down, activating his 
com to the bridge of the craft::
<Zardus, this is Dark One.  I am bringing in a wounded Oblitercon.  Also, 
there is a unit called Onimous, he wishes to join the Alliance so it seems.  
I suggest having him wait outside the base, and keeping defences locked onto 
his every move.  Please lower the shields (if you have any, that is)>

===========

::Injector slammed his fist against the boulder he was behind::
"More units, more slaggin' units!  Friggin dragon, die, die, die!" 
(Note to JP, if Hell Beast arrives on the scene of the Predacon craft, please 
make not of Injector and co, they are his minions)
::Injector fired off three stinger missiles at (Don't know your e-mail 
address, but it's Mantella's character) the dragon that had came out of the 
stasis pod outside of the Predacon ship::

::Manterror fired off an ion disk at the dragon, taking out a charge, setting 
it to explode on impact, and tossed the explosive at the stasis pod::

::Double Punch slowly got up, not cloaked::
::He looked around, seeing Injector starting to lose it, and Manterror 
keeping his head, he spottted the dragon, looked around::
"The base...not the battlefield...what the...oh, slag." ::Double Punch slowly 
got off, firing two energy signature seeking missiles off at the dragon::

============
